thread.title: Houston Texans owner donates $10K to anti-LGBTQ campaign - KMIZ
thread.title_full: Houston Texans owner donates $10K to anti-LGBTQ campaign - KMIZ - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KMIZ
title: Houston Texans owner donates $10K to anti-LGBTQ campaign - KMIZ
text:
Houston Texans owner Bob McNair made a $10,000 donation this week to a local group that is advocating against LGBTQ rights. The Campaign for Houston has been trying to take down the anti-discrimination proposition known as Houston's Equal Rights Ordinance , or Proposition 1. The ordinance would prohibit discrimination of any kind based on sex, race, ethnicity, gender, nationality, age, martial status, religion, disability, sexual orientation or gender identity.
 KMIZ.
